trans-unit.source: , it also install another script to unwrap messages:
trans-unit.target: ，它还会安装另一个脚本来解包消息：

trans-unit.source: , you’ll have to configure your spamassassin.

Gmail has a few unique ways that they interact with a mail client. isbg must be considered to be a client due to interacting with the Gmail servers over IMAP, and thus, should conform to these special requirements for proper integration.
trans-unit.target: Gmail具有几种与邮件客户端进行交互的独特方式。 由于通过IMAP与Gmail服务器进行交互，因此必须将isbg视为客户端，因此应符合这些特殊要求以进行正确集成。
类型1：将邮件移至“ [Gmail] /垃圾箱”文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Type 2: Normal IMAP delete flag applied to a message.
trans-unit.target: 类型2：应用于邮件的常规IMAP删除标志。

trans-unit.source: isbg can do IMAP over SSL if your version of Python has been compiled with SSL support. Since Python 2.6, SSL comes built in with Python.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的Python版本已通过SSL支持进行编译，则isbg可以通过SSL执行IMAP。从Python 2.6开始，SSL内置在Python中。

trans-unit.source: isbg install a python package module and also a script to use it
trans-unit.target: isbg安装一个python软件包模块以及一个使用它的脚本

trans-unit.source: isbg is a script and a python 3 module that makes it easy to scan an IMAP inbox for spam using SpamAssassin and get your spam moved to another folder.
trans-unit.target: isbg是一个脚本和python 3模块，可轻松使用SpamAssassin扫描IMAP收件箱中的垃圾邮件，并将垃圾邮件移动到另一个文件夹。

trans-unit.source: isbg is written in the Python language. Python is installed by default on most Linux systems. You can can find out more about Python at Python home page.
trans-unit.target: isbg用Python语言编写。大多数Linux系统默认安装Python。您可以在Python主页上找到有关Python的更多信息 。

trans-unit.source: By default isbg saves the list of seen IMAP message unique IDs in a file in your home directory. It is named
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，isbg将可见的IMAP消息唯一ID列表保存在主目录中的文件中。它被命名

trans-unit.source: By default, SpamAssassin is spooled up and down each and every time isbg has an email to scan.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，每次isbg 有要扫描的电子邮件时，SpamAssassin都会被后台处理。

trans-unit.source: By default, SpamAssassin will perform many DNS lookups for NetworkTests to significantly improve scoring of messages primarily by DNSBlocklists like Spamhaus, SORBS, etc. If you don’t use a DNS cacher and you run isbg often, chances are you will hit the maximum number of free accepted queries on certain hosts and will get blocked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，SpamAssassin将对NetworkTest执行许多DNS查找，以显着提高主要由DNSBlocklist（例如Spamhaus，SORBS等）组成的邮件的评分。如果不使用DNS缓存并且经常运行isbg，则可能会达到最大数量在某些主机上接受的免费查询，将会被阻止。

trans-unit.source: By default, isbg ignores emails that are bigger than 120,000 bytes since spam are not often that big. If you ever get emails with score of 0 on 5 (0.0/5.0), it is likely that SpamAssassin is skipping it due to size.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，isbg会忽略大于120,000字节的电子邮件，因为垃圾邮件通常不会那么大。如果您收到的电子邮件在5（0.0 / 5.0）上的得分为0，则SpamAssassin可能会由于大小而跳过它。

trans-unit.source: By default, isbg scans 50 emails for operation: spam learn, ham learn and spam detection. If you want to change the default, you can use the
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，isbg扫描50封电子邮件以进行操作：垃圾邮件学习，火腿学习和垃圾邮件检测。如果要更改默认值，可以使用
配置您的垃圾邮件刺客

trans-unit.source: Consequently you should regard this as providing minimal protection if someone can read the file.
trans-unit.target: 因此,如果有人能够读取文件,你应该将其视为提供最低限度的保护。

trans-unit.source: Default maximum size can be changed with the use of the
trans-unit.target: 默认的最大尺寸可以通过使用下面的命令来改变。

trans-unit.source: Don’t fail when meeting horrible and bad formed mail
trans-unit.target: 遇到可怕的不良邮件时不要失败

trans-unit.source: Download a copy of the isbg repository onto your machine:
trans-unit.target: 下载一份 isbg 仓库的副本到你的机器上。

trans-unit.source: Enable Gmail integration mode by passing

However you should be aware that the SSL support does NOT check the certificate name nor validate the issuer. If an attacker can intercept the connection and modify all the packets flowing by, then they will be able to pose as the IMAP server. Other than that, the connection will have the usual security features of SSL.
trans-unit.target: 然而,你应该知道,SSL支持并不检查证书名称,也不验证发证者。如果攻击者能够拦截连接并修改所有流过的数据包,那么他们将能够冒充IMAP服务器。除此以外,该连接将具有SSL的一般安全功能。

trans-unit.source: IMAP assigns each message in a folder a unique id. isbg scans the folder for messages it hasn’t seen before, and for each one, downloads the message and feeds it to SpamAssassin. If SpamAssassin says the message is spam, then the SpamAssassin report is uploaded into your spam folder. Unless you specify the
trans-unit.target: IMAP为文件夹中的每个消息分配唯一的ID。isbg会扫描该文件夹中是否有以前从未看到过的邮件，然后针对每一个邮件下载邮件并将其提供给SpamAssassin。如果SpamAssassin说邮件为垃圾邮件，则SpamAssassin报告将上传到您的垃圾邮件文件夹中。除非您指定

trans-unit.source: If you don’t want isbg to prompt you for your password each time, you can specify the
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想让isbg每次都提示您输入密码，则可以指定

trans-unit.source: If you have never used SpamAssassin before, you’ll probably be quite nervous about it being too good and taking out legitimate email, or not taking out enough spam. It has an easily adjustable threshold to change how aggressive it is. Run the following command to create your preferences file:
trans-unit.target: 如果您以前从未使用过SpamAssassin，您可能会对它太好，无法接收合法电子邮件或无法接收足够的垃圾邮件感到非常紧张。它具有易于调整的阈值，可以改变它的攻击性。运行以下命令来创建您的首选项文件：

trans-unit.target: 如果你想让isbg跟踪所有的电子邮件,你可以禁用以下功能

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the

trans-unit.target: 通过pip安装(最简单的方法

trans-unit.source: Is not involved in the mail delivery process, and so can run on any machine that can contact your IMAP server
trans-unit.target: 不参与邮件发送过程,因此可以在任何能够联系您的IMAP服务器的机器上运行。

trans-unit.source: Lock file to prevent multiple instance to run at the same time (for cron jobs)
trans-unit.target: 锁定文件,防止多个实例同时运行(用于cron作业)。

trans-unit.target: 确保已安装SpamAssassin。所有必要的信息都可以在SpamAssassin Wiki上找到。SpamAssassin应该在您的身上

trans-unit.target: 松树和其他一些邮递员使用的是

trans-unit.source: Please join our isbg mailing list if you use isbg or contribute to it! The mailing list will be used to announce project news and to discuss the further development of isbg.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用isbg或对此做出贡献，请加入我们的isbg邮件列表！该邮件列表将用于宣布项目新闻并讨论isbg的进一步发展。

trans-unit.source: Please note, the current release of isbg only supports python 3. Python 2 is compatible with older releases.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当前的isbg版本仅支持python 3。Python 2与旧版本兼容。

trans-unit.source: Possibility to skip spam detection to stick only to the teach feature
trans-unit.target: 可以跳过垃圾邮件检测,只坚持教学功能。

trans-unit.source: Reference information was taken from gmail IMAP usage.
trans-unit.target: 参考信息来自gmail IMAP用法。

trans-unit.target: 运行下面的程序来建立一个windows安装程序。

trans-unit.source: See the CONTRIBUTORS file in the git repository for more information on who wrote and maintains this software.
trans-unit.target: 参见git仓库中的CONTRIBUTORS文件,了解更多关于谁编写和维护这个软件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Sensible defaults so you don’t have to do any configuring :-)
trans-unit.target: 合理的默认设置，因此您无需进行任何配置:-)

trans-unit.source: The IMAP specification does not permit clients to change the
trans-unit.target: IMAP规范不允许客户改变用户的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of isbg is to not make any changes your Inbox unless you specify specific command line options. Consequently you can experiment without worry at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: isbg的默认行为是不对收件箱进行任何更改，除非您指定特定的命令行选项。因此，您一开始就可以毫无后顾之忧。

trans-unit.source: The full documentation can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 完整的文档可以在这里找到。

trans-unit.source: The password is obfuscated, so anyone just looking at the contents won’t be able to see what it is. However, if they study the code to isbg then they will be able to figure out how to de-obfuscate it, and recover the original password. (isbg needs the original password each time it is run as well).
trans-unit.target: 密码是模糊的，因此任何人只要查看内容就看不到密码。但是，如果他们研究了isbg的代码，那么他们将能够弄清楚如何对其进行模糊处理并恢复原始密码。（isbg每次运行时也需要原始密码）。

trans-unit.source: The rendered man page can be read in the “Manual page for isbg_sa_unwrap” section of this documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可以在本文档的“ isbg_sa_unwrap的手册页”部分中阅读呈现的手册页。

trans-unit.source: The rendered man page can be read in the “Manual page for isbg” section of this documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可以在本文档的“ isbg的手册页”部分中阅读呈现的手册页。

trans-unit.source: There are two flags IMAP uses to mark messages,
trans-unit.target: IMAP有两个标志用来标记邮件。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of deletion on a Gmail server.

This “removes all labels” from the message. It will no longer appear in any folders and there will be a single copy located in the trash folder. Gmail will “empty the trash” after the received email message is 30 days old.
trans-unit.target: 这会“删除消息中的所有标签”。它不会再出现在任何文件夹中，并且在回收站文件夹中将只有一个副本。收到30天的电子邮件后，Gmail将“清空垃圾箱”。

trans-unit.source: This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it. There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个自由软件:您可以自由地改变和重新发布它。在法律允许的范围内,不作任何保证。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when your inbox has a lot of emails, since deletion and mail tracking are only performed at the end of the run and full scans can take too long.
trans-unit.target: 当你的收件箱有很多邮件时,这很有用,因为删除和邮件跟踪只在运行结束时进行,而全面扫描可能需要太长时间。

trans-unit.source: This program is licensed under the GNU General Public License version 3.
trans-unit.target: 该程序是根据GNU通用公共许可证版本3许可的。

trans-unit.source: This will “remove a single label” from a message. It will no longer appear in the folder it was removed from but will remain in other folders and also in the “All Mail” folder.
trans-unit.target: 这将从邮件中“删除单个标签”。它不再显示在从中删除的文件夹中，而是保留在其他文件夹以及“所有邮件”文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, scoring and make sure DNSBlocklists don’t start blocking you, it is a good idea to set up a DNS cacher.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高性能，计分并确保DNSBlocklists不会开始阻止您，设置DNS缓存器是一个好主意。

trans-unit.source: To run isbg for multiple accounts one after another, it is possible to use bash scripts like the ones in the examples directory. Since these scripts contain passwords and are thus sensitive data, make sure the file permissions are very restrictive.
trans-unit.target: 要一个接一个地为多个帐户运行isbg，可以使用示例目录中的bash脚本。由于这些脚本包含密码，因此属于敏感数据，因此请确保文件权限非常严格。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the normal mode of deployments for SpamAssassin, isbg does not need to be involved in mail delivery, and can run on completely different machines to where your mailbox actually is. So this is the perfect tool to take good care of your ISP mailbox without having to leave it.
trans-unit.target: 与SpamAssassin的常规部署模式不同，isbg不需要参与邮件传递，并且可以在与邮箱实际所在的完全不同的计算机上运行。因此，这是完美照顾您的ISP邮箱而不必离开它的完美工具。

trans-unit.source: Will work painlessly against multiple IMAP accounts and servers
trans-unit.target: 可轻松应对多个IMAP账户和服务器。

trans-unit.source: Works on Linux, MacOS X and Windows (even smartphones!)
trans-unit.target: 可在Linux、MacOS X和Windows上工作(甚至智能手机!)。

trans-unit.source: Works with all common IMAP servers
trans-unit.target: 适用于所有常见的IMAP服务器

trans-unit.source: You can also do a “Normal IMAP delete” on the message in the trash folder to cause it to be removed permanently without waiting 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以对回收站文件夹中的消息进行“常规IMAP删除”，以使其永久删除，而无需等待30天。

trans-unit.source: You can also edit the system-wide settings in
You can also hang out with us on IRC, at
trans-unit.target: 你也可以在IRC上和我们一起玩,地址是

trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用以下命令解开SpamAssassin捆绑的电子邮件

trans-unit.source: You can improve isbg’s performance by running SpamAssassin as a daemon and by telling isbg to use that instead of running a regular process.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将SpamAssassin作为守护程序运行，并告诉isbg使用它而不是运行常规进程来提高isbg的性能。

trans-unit.source: You can then run isbg with the
Your first step is to create a new folder to receive suspected spam. I use one named ‘spam’.

where XXXX is a 16 byte identifier based on the IMAP host, username and port number. Consequently you can just run isbg against different servers/accounts and it will automatically keep the tracked UIDs separate. You can override the filename with
